Here is a detailed version of the problem along with the saved file and model. 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/13SL0pw0DpX1_5LZrTzxYawOv3XHEOj3F/view?usp=sharing

When I undock from non standard positions, such as releasing a Nosecone, or Deploying an orbit from a space shuttle.  sometimes, if there is more than one control surface invovlved, the game gets very confused.   The camera no longer focuses on the object, and the game becomes unplayable.   If it happens, it will happen consistantly with the same parts allocation over several saves and even designs.   I've only seen it happen with medium and large docking ports

Sev: Medium

Freq: Happens a lot
